resources.contents:
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: companies-service-v2 API
  version: 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
paths:
  /company:
    get:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: page
        in: query
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
      - name: size
        in: query
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
    put:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Company'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Company'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /company/{company_id}/email/{id}:
    delete:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: company_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
  /company/{company_id}/location/{id}:
    delete:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: company_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
  /company/{company_id}/phones/{id}:
    delete:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: company_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
  /company/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    delete:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
    patch:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/JsonObject'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /company/{id}/email:
    get:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Email'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /company/{id}/location:
    get:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Location'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /company/{id}/phones:
    get:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Company Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Phone'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /employee:
    get:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: page
        in: query
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
      - name: size
        in: query
        schema:
          format: int32
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    put:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Employee'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Employee'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /employee/{employee_id}/emails/{id}:
    delete:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: employee_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
  /employee/{employee_id}/phones/{id}:
    delete:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: employee_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
  /employee/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    delete:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
    patch:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/JsonObject'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /employee/{id}/emails:
    get:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Email'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
  /employee/{id}/phones:
    get:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - user
        - writer
    post:
      tags:
      - Employee Resource
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          format: int64
          type: integer
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Phone'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
        "401":
          description: Not Authorized
        "403":
          description: Not Allowed
      security:
      - SecurityScheme:
        - admin
        - writer
components:
  schemas:
    Company:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        owner:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        site:
          type: string
        created:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        updated:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        employees:
          uniqueItems: true
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Employee'
        locations:
          uniqueItems: true
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Location'
        phones:
          uniqueItems: true
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Phone'
        emails:
          uniqueItems: true
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Email'
    Email:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        email:
          type: string
        created:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        company:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Company'
        employee:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Employee'
    Employee:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        firstName:
          type: string
        lastName:
          type: string
        fullName:
          type: string
        age:
          format: int32
          type: integer
        status:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Status'
        created:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        updated:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        phones:
          uniqueItems: true
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Phone'
        emails:
          uniqueItems: true
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Email'
        company:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Company'
    JsonObject:
      type: array
    LocalDateTime:
      format: date-time
      type: string
      example: 2022-03-10T12:15:50
    Location:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        address:
          type: string
        created:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        company:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Company'
    Phone:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        number:
          type: string
        created:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/LocalDateTime'
        company:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Company'
        employee:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Employee'
    Status:
      enum:
      - WORKING
      - NOT_WORKING
      type: string
